sentences.sContent: Generally speaking, the more expensive the stereo, the better it is.
sentences.sCn: 一般说来，立体声音响越贵的越好。

sentences.sContent: ...Responsibilities generally include supervising study spaces to ensure that a quiet atmosphere is maintained...
...What do foreigners generally think of British people according to the woman...
...Russia's other late nights and early mornings generally correspond to public holidays...
...and generally head off with less ambitious plans...
...Complaining in person or by letter is generally more effective...
...we generally don’t give gifts on other occasions except on someone’s birthday and Christmas...
...And while Europeans don’t generally exchange business gifts...
...Internet users in China are generally different from those of America More driven by practical needs...
...It generally does more harm than good...

words.tran: 一般的，普通的；综合的；大体的
类的；一般的；属的；非商标的
广义的，普遍的；无显著特点的
（有多方面知识和经验的）通才；多面手
（英）一般化；归纳；普遍原理（等于generalization）
推广（generalize的过去分词）；对…进行概括；使…一般化
推广；笼统地讲；概括（等于generalize）

trans.tranOther: used to introduce a statement that is true in most cases but not always
